entities.description: Multi-entity structure with payment run policies

ar_invoices.description: AR invoices with open and paid history, credit notes, rebills, partials

ap_vendor_bills.description: AP vendor bills with approval/hold states and payment run scheduling

fx_rates.description: FX rates per week with intentional missing-rate gaps

bank_statements_mt940.description: Bank statements in SWIFT MT940 format

bank_statements_camt053.description: Bank statements in camt.053 XML format

invariants: All invoices have entity_id matching an entity
All vendor bills have entity_id matching an entity
Partial payments sum to less than or equal to parent invoice amount
Intercompany transfers are marked with is_wash=1
Bank transactions match invoice amounts (within tolerance) when reconciled
Payment dates are after invoice dates
Due dates are after invoice dates

known_exceptions.exception: Some invoices have blank country/project fields (5% rate)
known_exceptions.reason: Simulates merged-cell-like blanks from Excel imports

known_exceptions.exception: Some amounts use scientific notation (1% rate)
Some references are noisy/variations of invoice numbers (15% rate)
Some currency pairs missing for certain weeks (8% rate)
Intercompany transfers appear in both source and target entity
known_exceptions.reason: Expected behavior - both sides of transfer are recorded
